name: Rico Caveglia
what_you_do: Rico Caveglia is an author, speaker, and creator of the Ageless Living Lifestyle and the Fearless Aging and Great News Podcasts, offering proven tips and strategies for improving health and well-being.
who_you_serve: Rico serves individuals interested in health and wellness, particularly those looking to age fearlessly and maintain vitality.
signature_programs: Fearless Aging TV Show, Be Bold Never Be Old e-book
current_projects: Fearless Aging TV Show aired every Wednesday @ 6 PM PT on e360tv.com
bio: Rico has conducted over 300 interviews and has been a Personal Trainer and Health Coach for 40 years. He has a chronological age of 80 and a fitness age of 35.
business_focus: Rico Caveglia is an author, speaker, and creator of the Ageless Living Lifestyle and the Fearless Aging and Great News Podcasts, offering proven tips and strategies for improving health and well-being. (wellness)
